 Oct 2, 2016    Sarad Gajurel    Reading time: 2 minutes

I have already posted about my event of winning NOSKode2016 held on Software Freedom Day. I along with my team other members of our team Aarcana: for society were rewarded with the certificate of excellence and were given an opportunity to learn an web development course worth NRs. 20,000 for free at TECHRISE. It was a great moment of joy and our happiness was on the top. So here is how our web development career begun at TECHRISE.

Recover Grub of EFI System in Linux

 Sep 30, 2016    Sarad Gajurel    Reading time: 2 minutes

All the linux users who use distro having GRUB as a bootloader are aware of its value. That hard time when you power on the computer and after a brand logo the next screen just appears to show you message that GRUB was not able to load the entries. In this article, you’ll get to know how to recover the GRUB bootloader on EFI/UEFI system.

Won NOSKode 2016

 Sep 22, 2016    Sarad Gajurel    Reading time: 4 minutes

Almost every techie is aware about 3rd Saturday of September and specially those who love open source, it is obviously a special day. Yes, it is the day of freedom and liberty which we call as Software Freedom Day. It is a global event and is being celebrated since 2004 August 28. Software Freedom Day.
